exceptions.tactic: apply step_X_tot in Hstep_Y as [st2_X Hstep_X].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (I : X) (st1 : nat * state_X), exists st2 : nat * state_X, I /X/ st1 -1> st2" on hypothesis of type "Q /Y/ (linker i1, w1) ->> final_Y".

original: intros Hsim Hterm_Y. destruct Hterm_Y as [final_Y [Hstep_Y Hfinal_Y]]. apply step_X_tot in Hstep_Y as [st2_X Hstep_X]. exists st2_X. split. - exists final_Y. split; auto. eapply step_Y_fun; eauto. - eexists; eauto.
